text: Soni mwalakwemo twalamwile wanganyao yanti: “Mundu awulajidwe ligongo lya kuwulaga mundu, liso likolotoledwe ligongo lya kolotola liso, lupula lukatidwe ligongo lyakata lupula, liwiwi likatidwe ligongo lyakata liwiwi, lino likuulidwe ligongo lyakuula lino, nombe mawanga gana mbusyo (syakwe).” Nambo jwaakululwiche yalakweyo mwasadaka, basi yele (yakululukayo) tiyintendekasye kululuchilidwa sambi syakwe, soni wangakwilanyichisya yaatulwisye Allah, basi wanganyao niwali walupuso
